minecraft:written_book_content.title: §kThe End
minecraft:written_book_content.author: §kThe Universe
pages:
{"text":"§kIt can almost read our thoughts.

§kHow does it see us?

§kAs writing in a book.

§kAs words on a screen.

§kAs sounds in the distance."}

{"text":"§kDoes it know what we are thinking? Can it see us?

§kNo, not yet. But it knows we are here."}
